entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 9:43 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
